name: YouChoose
text: This was a group project for a codefellows 301 course that involved the importing content from the Youtube API, the google oauth2 sign in method and local storage. This was a great experience in rapid prototyping while incorporating new technologies. The API calls were new to the team. We also incorporated client side routing and local storage into the project. db storage via firebase will be added shortly as we are continuing to work on this.

name: BeerNuts
text: Beer information page with recommendations for local Seattle brew pubs and a beer style selector with an associated triva game.

name: Cookie-Stand
text: First app using a constructor and form data that was built during an 201 level javascript course. Pat loves making salmon cookies. Are they salmon flavored or salmon shaped? We may never know

name: BusMall
text: Product survey app built to get user preferences over a series of photos with results displayed using Chart.js
